room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: The Escape Game is so much fun and maybe a little stressful for some one us lol. There was 5 of us and we did the Classified Room which was challenging. We made it to the last room and had two clues left to escape. In the end we may had not escaped but we had lots of fun trying. I Can't wait to go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: It was great and a great experience, even though we didn't escape! Classified Room is the bomb!

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: This was a great experience! Did it with the family on vacation and it was worth every penny! We'll be back to play the other games!

room_title: Escape room "Classified" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: My boyfriend and I decided to do this and played classified while here in Pigeon Forge, we didn't escape but almost did! This seriously was so much fun and I would recommend this to any one in the area! Well worth the money it is so much fun!
